contentrichtext.text: {{primarysources|biography|date=October 2007}} '''Sylvia McNicoll''' (born 1954) is a [[Canada|Canadian]] [[children's writer]] who lives in [[Burlington, Ontario|Burlington]], [[Ontario]]. McNicoll was born in [[Ajax, Ontario|Ajax]], Ontario and grew up in [[Montreal]], [[Quebec]]. In addition to writing, she works as features editor for ''Today's Parent Toronto''. Syliva McNicoll has three children. Jennifer, Craig and Robin. Sylvia has three grandsons, Hunter, William and Desmond and two granddaughters Jadzia and Violet. Her daughter, Jennifer, is also an author who writes science fiction under the name J M Filipowicz. And don't forget about her superstar hockey and american football player he can score goals from any where on the ice and is amazing on a brake away he will always score when on. And his football skills are the same he is amazing a getting a touch down usually scores by a running play but can make a catch for a td.
